title: Title
the_more_you_set_the_cost_the_higher_the: The higher the fee the quicker the transaction will be processed
no_unconfirmed_transactions: There are currently no unconfirmed transactions
no_confirmed_transactions: There are currently no confirmed transactions
no_partial_transactions: There are currently no partial transactions
amount_can_not_be_less_than_0: The amount should be greater than 0
fee_can_not_less_than_0: Max fee cannot be less than 0
duration_can_not_more_than_10_years: Duration cannot be greater than 10 years
enter_asset_type_alias_or_address_search: Enter transaction hash to search for
Accumulated_delegated_harvesting_income_: Accumulated delegated harvesting income is not yet available
please_enter_the_transfer_amount: Please enter the amount to transfer
please_enter_your_new_password_again: Please enter your profile password again
please_enter_the_initial_supply: Please enter the initial supply amount
flags_supply: The total supply must be in the range of 0 and 9,000,000,000,000,000 atomic units.
flags_divisibility: Determines the decimal place to which the mosaic can be divided. The divisibility must be in the range of 0 and 6.
flags_transferable: If set to true, the mosaic can be transferred to arbitrary accounts.
flags_variable_supply: If set to true, the mosaic supply will be mutable.
flags_restrictable: If set to true, the mosaic owner can configure custom restrictions.
flags_duration_permanent: If set to true, the mosaic will never expire.
enter_the_number_of_blocks: Enter the blocks amount to rent the mosaic, 1 block = 1XYM.
please_enter_the_amount_of_change: Please enter the amount of change
the_duration_is_calculated_in_blocks_one: The duration is calculated in blocks, one block is 15 seconds.
Enter 24 words, please pay attention to the order, separated by a space between each word
keystore_description_text: This password is the KeyStore decryption password.
keystore_description_import: From your computer, paste the KeyStore string in the input box below.
please_enter_your_keystore_password_agai: Please enter your keystore password again
keep_it_in_a_safe_place_on_the_isolated_: Keep them in a safe place and do not share or store mnemonics in any shared or non-secure environment, such as emails, photo albums, social network, message, etc.
please_safely_back_up_the_Keystore: Please safely back up the Keystore
do_not_save_to_email_notepad_web_chat_et: Don't save to email, notepad, web, chat, etc, and don't send via any internet/network transmission.
Do_not_transmit_through_network_tools_on: Do not transmit over the internet or any network, It is recommended that you only store offline and transmit by scanning the QR code.
it_is_recommended_to_use_password_manage: It is recommended to use a password management tool to store your password
getting_a_mnemonic_equals_ownership_of_a: This mnemonic passphrase is enough to take the control of all the assets of a profile.
use_paper_and_pen_to_correctly_copy_mnem: Use a pen and paper to correctly copy mnemonics. If you lose access via this install/device your mnemonic will restore your accounts and assets.
keep_it_in_a_safe_place_on_the_isolated_: Keep it in a safe place. Do not share and store mnemonics in any shared or remote environment, such as emails, photo albums, social applications, etc.
please_accurately_copy_the_safety_backup: Please accurately copy the safety backup mnemonic
please_click_on_the_mnemonic_in_y_backup: Please accurately copy the safety backup mnemonic
please_click_on_the_mnemonic_in_order_to: Please click on the mnemonic in order to confirm that you are backing up correctly.
the_mnemonic_order_is_correct_and_the_ba: The mnemonic order is correct and the backup is successful.
use_paper_and_pen_to_correctly_copy_the_: Use a pen and paper to correctly copy the private key. If you lose access or your device is lost, stolen or damaged, the private key will be able to recover your assets.
keep_it_in_a_safe_place_on_the_isolated_: Keep them in a safe place. Do not share and store your private key in any internet or networked environment, such as emails, photo albums, social applications, etc.
please_accurately_copy_the_secure_backup: Please accurately copy the secured backup of your private key
This_password_is_used_to_encrypt_your_pr: This password is used for encrypting/decrypting your keystore.
Please_select_each_phrase_to_make_sure_t: Please select each phrase to make sure the mnemonic is correct
You_passed_the_test_please_be_sure_to_ke: You have verified your mnemonic, please be sure to keep it safe
phishing_warning: Beware of phishing! This program will not ask you to enter your mnemonic except when restoring a profile from scratch.
If_you_need_to_back_up_your_mnemonics_ag: If you need to back up your mnemonics again, you can find them in 'Profile Management - Profile Details - Export Mnemonics'.
Please_enter_a_mnemonic_to_ensure_that_t: Please enter a mnemonic to ensure that it is correct
this_account_is_not_a_cosignatory: This account is not a co-signatory
namespace_tips_key_1: 1. The name must be unique in the network, and may have a maximum length of 64 characters. Accepted characters include:
namespace_tips_key_3: 3. The namespace can be defined as up to three levels deep.
namespace_tips_value_2: nem, user, account, org, com, biz, net, edu, mil, gov , info.
namespace_duration_tip_1: The duration is calculated in blocks, one block is 15 seconds, one block = 1XYM, and the maximum period is 365 days.
namespace_list_tips_1: 1. Only the root namespace needs to be updated. All subs-namespaces will be automatically renewed with the root namespace;
namespace_list_tips_2: 2. Namespaces can be registered for up to 10 years and you have a grace period of 30 days after expiration to renew. If the namespace expires the root namespace and any of the sub-namespaces under it will be lost;
this_account_is_already_converted: This account has already been converted to a multi-signature account
Please_enter_the_label_before_filling_in: Please enter the label before filling in the input
Drag_and_drop_files_to_this_point_click_: Drag and drop files to this point click or browse
The_file_to_be_audited_must_exist_in_Apo: The file to be audited must exist in Apostille format. You can confirm the file by file name:
This_password_is_used_for_desktop_accoun: This password is used to unlock the application
Any_information_cannot_be_empty: Fields cannot be empty. Please, verify your input.
co_signers_amount_less_than_0: Multi-signature accounts must have at least 1 co-signatory
min_approval_amount_less_than_0: The minimum number of co-signatories needed for approval cannot be smaller than 1
min_removal_amount_less_than_0: The minimum number of co-signatories needed for removal cannot be smaller than 1
illegal_publicKey: The account public key you provided is invalid
min_approval_amount_illegal: The minimum number of co-signatories needed for approval must be a number
min_removal_amount_illegal: The minimum number of co-signatories needed for removal must be a number
max_approval_amount_more_than_10: The maximum number of co-signatories needed for approval cannot exceed 10
max_removal_amount_more_than_10: The maximum number of co-signatories needed for removal cannot exceed 10
The_value_of_duration_cannot_be_less_tha: The duration must be greater than or equal to 1
Namespace_cannot_be_a_null_or_empty_stri: The namespace name cannot be an empty string
The_root_namespace_cannot_be_longer_than: A root namespace name cannot be longer than 16 characters
The_sub_namespace_cannot_be_longer_than_: A sub-namespace name cannot be longer than 64 characters
Namespace_must_start_with_a_letter: A namespace name must start with a lowercase character
Namespace_can_only_contain_numbers_lette: A namespace name can only contain 0-9, A-Za-z, _ and - characters
Namespace_cannot_use_forbidden_words: This namespace name is protected and cannot be used
This_password_is_used_for_importing_the_: This password is used for unlocking your accounts. Please, make sure to have a backup of this password.
The_mosaic_to_be_sent_is_empty: The mosaics list cannot be empty
Node_not_available_please_check_your_nod: Node is not available. Please check your node or network settings.
Please_enter_the_amount_of_transfer: Please enter the amount to transfer
Please_enter_mosaic_hex_or_alias: Please enter a mosaic id or a mosaic alias (@nem.xym)
choose_profile_name_and_password: Chose a profile name and a password
please_accurately_copy_the_hd_account_pa: Please, make sure to backup the address path
connect_trezor_title: Connect to a Trezor Hardware Wallet
connect_trezor_description: Import a wallet from a Trezor device
trezor_description: Trezor will keep your private keys secure and only expose them for signing transactions
mosaic_describe_text: A mosaic could be a token, but it could also be a collection of more specialized assets such as reward points, company shares, signatures, status flags, votes or even currencies.
mosaic_attribute_text: Each mosaic has a unique identifier and a set of configurable properties. As such, mosaics are flexible and can adapt to many scenarios.
mosaic_attribute_text_2: You can link a namespace to a mosaic to give it a friendly name.
Under_the_current_account: List of namespaces owned by the active account
A_namespace_starts_with_a_name_that_you_: A namespace starts with a name that you choose, similar to an internet domain name.
The_name_must_appear_as_unique_in_the_ne: The name must be unique in the network, and may have a maximum length of 64 characters, and the allowed characters are a, b, c, …, z, 0, 1, 2, …, 9, _ , -.
Namespaces_can_have_up_to_3_levels: Namespaces can be split in up to 3 levels. A sub-namespace does not have a duration, it is inherited its parent namespace.
Used_to_bind_a_account_address: Used to give friendly names to accounts or mosaics
seed_account_can_not_be_more_than_10: You have reached the limit of accounts that can be created in one profile. Please use a different profile to create a new account.
Delegated_harvesting_text_1: Delegated harvesting enables an account to use a proxy private key that can be shared with a node securely. In other words, you can use the importance score of your account to create new blocks without running a node.
Multisig_accounts_can_not_send_a_transac: Multi-signature accounts cannot initiate transactions. Please, use co-signatories accounts.
please_input_mosaic_and_amount: Enter a mosaic and an amount
refresh_too_fast_warning: Too many network requests have been executed. Please, try again later.
account_network_type_does_not_match_curr: The profile's network type does not match with the network type of the connected node.
account_network_does_not_match_current_n: The profile's network is different from the network of the connected node. Please create a new one.
no_network_currency_alert: The wallet could not load data about the network currency (eg. symbol:xym), please connect to a valid node.
Refresh_partial_transaction_of_address: Refresh partial transactions of a given address
Your_remote_account_has_been_successfull: Your linked account has been saved in the wallet successfully!
Import_your_remote_account_in_the_accoun: Import an existing linked account in the wallet
account_must_match_linked: The account you are importing must match the linked account key below.
if_want_new_account_unlink: If you want to use a new linked account, please unlink your account first.
Nothing_was_found_at_this_address: Nothing was found at this address
address_unknown: This address is unknown to the network, please try with its public key instead
invalid_namespace_or_mosaic_id: The mosaic id or name is invalid
Add_co_signers_here_will_be_displayed_in: Added co-signatories will be displayed in this list.
The_number_of_signatures_required_to_add: The minimum number of co-signatures needed for approval of transactions.
Please_set_the_minimum_number_of_signatu: The minimum number of co-signatures needed for approval of transactions must be smaller than or equal to the total number of co-signatories.
The_number_of_signatures_required_to_rem: The minimum number of co-signatures needed for removal of co-signatories.
Add_delete_co_signers_this_action_will_b: Add/remove co-signatories. After the process, this will be displayed in the list, click delete to cancel.
Do_not_have_Account: You don't have a profile yet?
existing_profile: Do you already have a profile?
More_Access_Tool_is_working: More authentication tools are being worked on...
import_mnemonic_passphrase_create_profil: Import a mnemonic passphrase to create a profile
program_description: This program is designed based on Symbol blockchain, an open source digital asset management system. Access the Symbol network, create profile manage accounts, assets and more...
profile_creation_description: Before you start using this software, you need to create a profile name and password. The password will be used to secure the access to your profile.
profile_description_tips1: Before you start using this software, you need to create a profile name and password. This wallet software leverages the power of hierarchical deterministic wallets (HD-Wallets)
profile_description_tips2: The password will be used to secure the access to your profile, it is used to encrypt your mnemonic passphrase. Multiple addresses can be managed under one profile and you can switch between profiles on the startup page.
profile_description_tips3: Please, backup both your password and 24-words mnemonic passphrase.
Input_mnemonic_tips: Enter the 12 or 24 words of your mnemonic passphrase separated by space.  The mnemonic passphrase is composed of 12 or 24 randomly chosen words. After setting the words, your assets will be restored.
import_successful: Congratulations, the profile was imported successfully!
creation_successful: Congratulations, the profile was created successfully!
Save_backups: Make multiple copies offline and save backups in multiple locations. Use encrypted disks for digital backups.
Create_account_and_password: Create a profile name and password
Move_your_mouse: Please move your mouse to improve randomness when generating the mnemonic passphrase
Don_not_disclose: Please, keep this information private. Sharing your mnemonic passphrase with others may put your funds at risk.
please_backup_mnemonic_passphrase: Make sure to create a backup copy of the mnemonic passphrase. You will need this backup when trying to recover your profile.
The_backup_is_wrong: Your mnemonic words backup is invalid. Please, carefully select the words in the correct order.
Generate_entropy_increase_success: Successfully generated a random mnemonic pass phrase.
Delegated_Harvesting_answer: Please input your password to unlock your account. An account link transaction will be sent first to delegate your importance, this will cost you 0.05 XYM. Following this, a persistent delegation request will be sent to a remote node and will cost another 0.05 XYM per request.
In_the_next_operation: Caution! The next operation involves the safety of your assets, please do it properly. Before proceeding, you need to enter your password to prove your identity.
Enter_password_to_unlock_account_transac: Enter password to unlock accountRemote_node_for_harvesting transaction operations
Please_paste_the_proxy_private_key_here: Please paste the proxy public key here
The_proxy_private_key_is_invalid_or_the_: The proxy private key is invalid or the private key is not detected
Please_enter_the_domain_name_or_IP_addre: Please enter the domain name or IP address of the node network
input_remote_node: Please enter the url of the remote node you want to link. The default node url has been selected for you.
no_default_node_yet_please_input_node: No remote node available, please enter the URL of the remote node you want to connect manually.
Whether_the_revenue_transaction_has_been: Wait for the revenue transaction to success
set_default_explorer: The url entered is not valid, a default url has been set for you.
password_is_invalid: The password must contain a minimum of 8 characters with alphabet letters and numbers.
mnemonic_generation_error: Something went wrong when generating your profile seed.
no_profiles_in_database: No profile in the wallet database
address_unknown_by_network: The account is unknown by the network until it sends a first transaction.
Are_you_sure_to_unlink_this_account: Are you sure to unlink this account?
remote_account_being_created: Please click the 'Generate' button to generate a valid remote account
Enter_your_password_to_create_a_remote_a: Enter your password to create a remote account
Please_set_transaction_fee_and_password: Please set transaction fee and password
Enter_your_password_to_create_a_link_tra: Enter your password to create an account link transaction
error_account_name_already_exists: This account name already exists. Please, enter a unique account name.
error_unknown: An unknown error happened. Please, try again later.
error_peer_connection_went_wrong: Something went wrong when connecting to the node {peerUrl} timed out
error_incorrect_url: This is not a valid URL
error_delete_all_peers: You can not delete all the nodes
error_new_password_format: The password should contain at least one letter and one number.
error_too_many_seed_accounts: You cannot create more than {maxSeedAccountsNumber} child accounts
success_password_changed: Your password was updated successfully. You will now be logged out.
success_settings_updated: Your settings have been updated successfully.
form_label_description_min_approval: Minimum signatures to sign a transaction or to add a cosigner
form_label_description_min_removal: Minimum signatures required to remove a cosigner
message_empty_cosignatories: This account does not have co-signatories.
error_new_namespace_duration_max_value: The new namespace duration can not be greater than {maxValue}
approval_removal_new_status: Account will be {newMinApproval} / {newNumberOfCosignatories} for approvals and {newMinRemoval} / {newNumberOfCosignatories} for removals
approval_removal_add_cosignatories: Account will be {newMinApproval} / {newNumberOfCosignatories} for approvals and {newMinRemoval} / {newNumberOfCosignatories} for removals
approval_greater_than_cosignatories: There are {delta} more required cosignatories for min. approval than available cosignatories. Please add cosignatories or reduce the min. approval number.
removal_greater_than_cosignatories: There are {delta} more required cosignatories for min removal than available cosignatories. Please add cosignatories or reduce the min. removal number.
too_many_cosignatories: The maximum number of cosignatories is {maxCosignatoriesPerAccount}, please remove {delta} cosignatories
option_child_account: I want to create a child account for my profile
option_privatekey_account: I want to import an existing account private key
max_decimal_number_error: The {_field_} field must have {maxDecimalNumber} decimals or less.
accounts_backup_qrcode_explain_p1: Use the button on the right to backup your mnemonic passphrase by downloading a QRCode.
accounts_backup_qrcode_explain_p2: You will be asked to unlock your profile. After unlocking your profile, the download will start automatically.
accounts_backup_mnemonic_explain_p1: Use the button on the right to backup your mnemonic passphrase by displaying the 24 words on the screen.
accounts_backup_mnemonic_explain_p2: You will be asked to unlock your profile. After unlocking your profile, the mnemonic passphrase will appear.
accounts_backup_mnemonic_explain_p3: Please, make sure to backup the following {num} words in a safe place. These {num} words represent your mnemonic passphrase and can be used to import your profile and its' child accounts at a later point in time.
accounts_backup_mnemonic_explain_qrcode: Please, make sure to backup the following QRCode in a safe place. This QRCode can be used to import your profile and its' child accounts at a later point in time.
accounts_backup_keystore_explain_p1: Use the button on the right to backup your private and public keys by downloading an encrypted key file.
accounts_backup_keystore_explain_p2: You will be asked to unlock your profile. After unlocking your profile, the download will start automatically.
accounts_harvesting_remote_explain_p1: Use the button on the right to configure a remote account for harvesting. This will later permit your account to activate delegated harvesting.
accounts_harvesting_remote_explain_p2: You will be asked to unlock your account and will then view options for the setup of a remote account for harvesting.
accounts_harvesting_request_explain_p1: Use the button on the right to send a harvesting delegation request. If approved by the node, this will activate harvesting for your account.
accounts_harvesting_request_explain_p2: You will be asked to unlock your account and will then view options for sending harvesting delegation requests to Peer nodes.
info_active_cosignatory_mode: The selected transaction signer is a multi-signature account.
transaction_needs_cosignature_explain: This multisignature transaction needs multiple parties to sign it before it is approved. Please enter your password and confirm to add your signature.
transaction_needs_cosignature_explain_si: This transaction needs multiple parties to approve by sending co-signature. You have already send a co-signature for this transaction. Please, wait until other co-signatories approve.
warning_already_a_cosignatory: This account is already a cosignatory!
notification_new_aggregate_bonded: A new aggregate partial transaction has been announced
notification_new_cosignature: An aggregate transaction has been co-signed
no_data_transactions: No transactions were found for this account
no_data_namespaces: No namespaces were found for this account
no_data_mosaics: No mosaics were found for this account
refresh_failed: An error ocurred. Please, try again later.
no_data_namespace_tips: You do not have a namespace, please create one first
